title: Why I put away my Bose QuietComfort headphones shortly after testing this alternative
contentSnippet: On paper, the Bowers & Wilkins Px8 S2 may look eerily similar to the midrange Px7 S3. But the price bump is easily justified.
content: On paper, the Bowers & Wilkins Px8 S2 may look eerily similar to the midrange Px7 S3. But the price bump is easily justified.
